location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Several words on the right hand side of each line of the letter have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication which reports the arrival of Mr Buckingham in Bushire.
